text: Doonga Gali is a tourist town of the Galyat area of Ayubia. It is in Abbottabad District in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Pakistan. It is at a height of 2500 meters.Imperial Gazetteer of India, v. 11, p. 379 == References == Category:Hill stations in Pakistan Category:Union councils of Abbottabad District Category:Towns in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa
title: Doonga Gali
